page.title: 15King's Sutton Sports Clubs
page.content: King's Sutton is a very lucky village because just outside, on the Charlton Road, there is a sports ground. The kind villagers donated the money towards making it. The three tennis courts are private and belong to the Tennis Club, but only one of the players has to be a member. About 36 members come to play on Sundays and their team is one of the very best locally. There is also a pitch where cricket and football are played on Saturdays. There are over one hundred members of the Football Club and the teams are well supported. Both the cricket and football teams are well up their leagues. There is even a successful rounders team!
